name: 2048 (itch) (ElanMakesGames)
description:
HOW TO PLAY: 

Use the arrow keys, WASD, or swipe with the mouse to move tiles. Tiles with the same number merge into one when they touch. Add them up to reach 2048! Post your high score in the comments!

If it's not working, try clicking on the game, or refreshing the page.

CREDITS:

 A remake of the original 2048 game by Gabriele Cirulli.

▢ Inspiration from Asher Vollmer's game Threes.

▢ Using DEMIGIANT's tween engine tool DoTween.

▢ Used coding tutorials from Tarodev.

▢ Used Roboto from Google Fonts, and Google Material Icons.

▢ Color palettes from Coolors.

▢ Thanks to Will Cash for playtesting and design advice, and making a palette!

Have a palette suggestion? Make one on Coolors and leave a link in the comments!

Play the OG 2048 here, and reverse 2048 here.
